title: Secure Authentication and Access Control
summary: Implement secure multi-factor authentication and role-based access management for customers.
description: Develop a secure, identity-based access system for the self-service banking portal. Implement multi-factor authentication (MFA) for secure user logins, session handling, and logout procedures. Include role-based access control (RBAC) to ensure that customers, administrators, and staff can only access features and data appropriate to their roles. This EPIC ensures system and data integrity with full compliance to banking security regulations.

userStories.title: Multi-Factor Authentication for Login
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to log in using multiple authentication factors so that my account remains secure.

userStories.title: Session and Timeout Management
userStories.description: As a customer, I want inactive sessions to auto-expire so that unauthorized users cannot access my information.

userStories.title: Role-Based Access Permissions
userStories.description: As a system administrator, I want to assign and control access permissions based on roles so that users can only access authorized features.

title: Personalized Dashboard Creation
summary: Develop a dynamic dashboard displaying customer-specific account details, services, and products.
description: Design and develop a personalized dashboard for customers that shows relevant banking data, active accounts, personalized offers, and financial recommendations based on customer profile and eligibility. The dashboard should serve as a central command center providing quick actions, recently submitted requests, and real-time notifications.

userStories.title: Display Account Overview and Balances
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to see all my accounts and their balances in one place so that I can review my financial status easily.

userStories.title: Personalized Product and Offer Recommendations
userStories.description: As a customer, I want personalized product recommendations based on my eligibility so I can explore relevant products easily.

userStories.title: Quick Access Widgets
userStories.description: As a customer, I want quick access to common actions and recent requests from my dashboard so that I can perform tasks with minimal clicks.

title: Responsive User Interface
summary: Ensure consistent user interface and performance across devices and screen sizes.
description: Implement a responsive interface that automatically adapts to desktop, tablet, and mobile layouts. Maintain optimal performance with consistent visuals, intuitive navigation, and accessibility compliance. This ensures customers have a fluid experience regardless of device type or resolution.

userStories.title: Responsive Layout Design
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the banking portal to adjust dynamically across devices so that I can use it seamlessly anywhere.

userStories.title: Optimized Mobile and Tablet Support
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to be optimized for mobile and tablet usage so that I can easily access features on any device.

userStories.title: Accessibility Standards Compliance
userStories.description: As a user with special accessibility needs, I want the portal to comply with accessibility standards so that I can use it smoothly.

title: Digital Account Opening and Service Request Management
summary: Enable digital workflows for account openings and service modifications.
description: Provide customers with intuitive workflows to open new accounts or request modifications to existing ones without visiting a physical branch. Implement guided steps, automatic validation, and progress tracking to minimize manual inputs and reduce completion time. These workflows should integrate securely with backend systems for seamless submission and processing.

userStories.title: Digital Account Opening Workflow
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to open new bank accounts online so that I can start services without visiting a branch.

userStories.title: Service Modification Flow
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to request changes to my existing services online so that I can manage updates easily.

userStories.title: Request Form Autofill from Profile Data
userStories.description: As a customer, I want request forms to be pre-populated with available data so that I can complete submissions faster.

title: Application Draft and Document Management
summary: Enable document uploads and draft saving for incomplete workflows.
description: Provide a mechanism for users to upload necessary documents securely for account openings or service requests. Allow customers to save incomplete applications as drafts and resume them later without re-entering previously completed data. Use encrypted storage for sensitive document handling to maintain full compliance with banking security requirements.

userStories.title: Secure Document Upload Functionality
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to upload supporting documents for my applications so that I can complete the process online.

userStories.title: Save Application as Draft
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to save an incomplete application as a draft so that I can return and finish it later.

userStories.title: Retrieve and Resume Draft Applications
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to resume working on a previously saved draft so that I can complete pending forms conveniently.

title: Notifications and Real-Time Status Updates
summary: Provide real-time and email-based alerts on request progress and updates.
description: Develop an integrated notification and tracking system that provides customers with live updates on their service requests. Display progress statuses within the portal and send email notifications for key updates. Include a message inbox for viewing historical notifications and request tracking.

userStories.title: Real-Time Status Tracker
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to track the progress of my submitted requests in real time so that I stay informed of current status.

userStories.title: Email Notification System
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to receive email notifications for significant updates so that I can monitor my application progress remotely.

userStories.title: Notification History Center
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to review past notifications so that I can check previous updates anytime.

title: User Activity History and Audit Logs
summary: Track user interactions and system events securely for compliance.
description: Implement an audit log and activity history module to record user transactions, interactions, and service requests. Provide customers with access to personal histories while ensuring administrators can generate compliance-ready audit trails for verification and monitoring purposes.

userStories.title: Personal Activity History View
userStories.description: As a customer, I want to view a complete history of my interactions and requests so that I can track past activities conveniently.

userStories.title: System Audit Log Generation
userStories.description: As an administrator, I want to generate audit logs of all customer transactions and activities so that I can maintain compliance with regulations.

title: Core Banking System Integration
summary: Integrate the portal seamlessly with the bankâ€™s existing core systems.
description: Create secure and standardized APIs to integrate the self-service portal with the bank's core banking infrastructure. The integration should support real-time synchronization of customer data, service requests, and account updates, ensuring consistency between systems while adhering to strict security protocols.

userStories.title: API-Based Core Banking Communication
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to set up APIs for core system connectivity so that the portal can synchronize data accurately and safely.

userStories.title: Real-Time Transaction Data Sync
userStories.description: As a customer, I want the portal to display updated information in real time so that I have consistent data visibility.

title: Portal Database and Performance Optimization
summary: Develop a dedicated, high-performance portal database optimized for user activity.
description: Establish an independent database architecture optimized for portal performance. Implement indexing, caching, monitoring, and data replication strategies to ensure fast response times and reliability. Maintain separation from the core banking system to reduce operational load and enhance resilience.

userStories.title: Independent Database Architecture
userStories.description: As a system architect, I want the portal to have a separate, optimized database so that performance remains consistent and reliable.

userStories.title: Performance and Load Testing
userStories.description: As a QA engineer, I want to perform load and performance testing so that the portal remains scalable under heavy usage.

title: Security and Compliance Management
summary: Implement comprehensive security, encryption, and regulatory compliance measures.
description: Incorporate security measures such as encryption for data at rest and in transit, intrusion detection, and vulnerability scanning. Ensure full compliance with data privacy and banking regulations including GDPR, PCI DSS, and other relevant standards. Schedule regular security audits and compliance reviews.

userStories.title: End-to-End Encryption Implementation
userStories.description: As a compliance officer, I want all customer data to be encrypted in transit and at rest so that sensitive information remains secure.

userStories.title: Regulatory Compliance Validation
userStories.description: As an auditor, I want to verify that the portal meets all regulatory and security standards so that we maintain compliance with financial data policies.
